name: When Everything Went Dark
description:
When Everything Went Dark is a  survival game where you need to manage your power generator and look for fuel around abandoned buildings.
Assets Used: Audios:

Game UI Sounds | Breathing Panicked | Retro Strikes | Morning Birds | Ghost Wails | Outside at Night | Birds Chirping | Door Open 3 Creaky | Turning Off The Engine | Motor Loop | Gewonnen | Footsteps Loop

Fonts:

Grape Soda | Kiwi Soda
